english.segment1: Here I am, is it too late?. When all I've known has been misplaced. Hold me close, don't ever let me go. You come to me like a summer's breeze. Now I've fallen on my knees. Hold me close, don't ever let me go. Don't let me go. Don't let me go
english.segment2: All this time I'm falling into you. All this time I'm falling into you
english.segment3: I'll climb across, I won't look down. So afraid to hit the ground. Could you really catch me when I fall?. When I fall, when I fall
